channel.title: Hosting?
channel.description: Okay well my parenst get mad that I keep the computer on so is there any other way I could host it someone else could host it?

item.title: Hosting?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

You could also remove all of your .java files and just leave the .class files in there. With the .class files you can still run the server, but can’t edit it, allowing someone else to host your server files for you through their computer without changing it on you. The down side about this is that you can’t edit it yourself while they have it, so keep a copy of your source before doing everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

runefreak10:

Asking that here in a thread isn’t allowed, however private messaging people is

Actually i don’t see why he can’t post it here, it’s about private server hosting.


Anyways
You can buy a Dedicated or Virtual Dedicated Server with Windows Server 2003 or some Form of Linux if that’s your choice.

How much would you be willing to pay monthly to have another computer host it?

Note: you would manage the computer, but it would be somewhere else… Its like owning 2 computers but you only get to physically sit down and see yours. The other one could be located in France or England or the USA.

It’s a monthly price and can range from $30-$300 dollars a month. This would also increase your up time and allow you to have less lag.

Read full topic
